Salary Insights Made Simple

Curtain is a FREE Chrome Extension that automatically provides salary insights in real-time as you search for new roles on LinkedIn.

Whether you're navigating your next salary bump or a difficult job market, Curtain saves you time and extra effort during your job search, while helping you find your worth.

Getting started is seamless and completely anonymous. Curtain does NOT collect or sell any personal data. 

Here's how to get started:
1. Download the extension & pin to your browser
2. Submit your salary details anonymously
3. Search for new roles on LinkedIn
4. Curtain will automatically provide a compensation breakdown, show salary insights for similar roles when applicable, and give you an idea of how the employer pays for that role relative to the national average.

Join hundreds of users from top employers including, Google, Microsoft, Meta, and more.
